pages.text: The vaccum freezer is needed to cool down hot tungstensteel, but it can also be used as a cheap way to get blue ice, as it requires a lot less of packed ice and for those a lot less of ice to be processed. If you need more peridot, try electrolyzing basalt dust.

pages.title: Ind. Machine Casing
pages.text: For the multiblock, we need industrial casings. Can also be used to increase the heat of the industrial blast furnace.
